name: Text Twist I Love You
description:
This is an broken, borderline unplayable and masochistic homage to a similar game I used to play a lot of before adobe flash was killed on December 31, 2020, called 'Text Twist'.

I had some ideas about this game and assets made laying around for awhile, so I 'finished' it for Trijam #212: https://itch.io/jam/trijam-212
